statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 100 AND quantity > 10
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND customer_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE id = 1001 AND quantity <= 0;
DELETE FROM delivery WHERE status = 'delivered' AND delivery_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND unit_price > 100.00;
